decks.notes: The deck is focused on aggressive gameplay with a mix of control elements. It utilizes Kefka, Court Mage as the commander to pressure the opponent while disrupting their strategy. The deck includes a variety of removal spells like Fatal Push, Terminate, and Dismember to deal with threats efficiently. It also features counterspells such as Force of Negation and Mana Leak to protect its own game plan. The deck aims to establish board presence quickly with creatures like Troll of Khazad-d√ªm and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger, while also utilizing card advantage engines like Snapcaster Mage and Baleful Strix. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain control of the game until victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing the aggressive nature of the partners Bruse Tarl and Yoshimaru to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of powerful creatures and removal spells. The goal is to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure to force the opponent to react defensively, allowing for the commanders to deal damage and secure victory. The deck includes a variety of efficient creatures like Bonecrusher Giant, Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, and Kari Zev, Skyship Raider, alongside removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt to deal with threats. Additionally, the deck includes equipment like Embercleave and Skullclamp to enhance the effectiveness of the creatures and push for lethal damage.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game tempo with a focus on instant spells and counters, utilizing Hydro-Man, Fluid Felon as the commander. The deck includes a wide range of counterspells like Counterspell, Mana Leak, and Daze to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also includes bounce spells like Engulf the Shore and Evacuation to clear the board when necessary. The deck aims to outsmart the opponent with card draw spells like Brainstorm and Serum Visions, while also including powerful finishers like True-Name Nemesis and Torrential Gearhulk. Overall, the key strategy is to maintain control of the game through counterplay and strategic decision-making.

The focus of this deck is to aggressively use graveyard recursion and manipulation to bring out powerful creatures and spells quickly, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with disruption spells like Duress and Inquisition of Kozilek. The deck aims to efficiently fill the graveyard with cards like Buried Alive and Careful Study, then utilize cards like Animate Dead and Necromancy to bring back key threats like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty. Superior Spider-Man serves as the commander, providing additional utility and a strong presence on the battlefield. The deck also includes a range of powerful sorceries and instants like Demonic Tutor and Toxic Deluge to control the board and maintain momentum.

The deck revolves around utilizing aggressive creatures and equipment to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It focuses on using Cloud, Midgar Mercenary as the commander to lead the charge and apply constant pressure. The deck includes a mix of efficient removal spells, protection spells, and disruptive creatures to disrupt the opponent's strategy while advancing its own game plan. With a strong creature base and powerful equipment like Umezawa's Jitte and Sword of Feast and Famine, the deck aims to chip away at the opponent's life total and control the battlefield. By combining efficient creatures with versatile equipment, the deck aims to quickly outpace the opponent and secure victory through aggressive combat strategies.

The main concept of the deck is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and equipment. The deck focuses on utilizing Cloud, Midgar Mercenary as the commander to lead the charge, supported by various efficient creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Drannith Magistrate. Equipment cards such as Umezawa's Jitte and Sword of Feast and Famine are included to enhance the effectiveness of the creatures in combat. The deck also includes disruption spells like Swords to Plowshares and mana denial cards like Tectonic Edge to keep the opponent on the back foot. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats and maintain control of the battlefield.

The main concept of this deck is to establish early board presence and apply consistent pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck aims to control the board by efficiently removing threats with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares while maintaining a steady stream of damage with creatures like Mogg Fanatic and Grim Lavamancer. The deck also includes powerful card advantage engines like Seasoned Pyromancer and Skullclamp to ensure a steady flow of resources. The commander, Taii Wakeen, Perfect Shot, provides additional value by potentially dealing damage to the opponent each turn, putting pressure on their life total and forcing them to react to the aggressive game plan.

The main idea of this deck is to utilize the aggressive capabilities of Tifa Lockhart as the commander to overwhelm the opponent quickly in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format. The deck focuses on playing efficient creatures like Fyndhorn Elves and Llanowar Elves to ramp up mana early on and enable fast plays. It also includes a variety of pump spells like Might of Old Krosa and Groundswell to buff up creatures and deal massive damage. The deck features a mix of protection spells like Snakeskin Veil and Veil of Summer to keep critical creatures safe. Overall, the key concept is to build a fast and aggressive board presence, using efficient creatures and pump spells to quickly defeat the opponent.
